p: Pedroso and coworkers [ 197] and Rosa et al. [ 183] observed immiscibility between TPS and LDPE, Euaphantasate et al. [ 198] produced LLDPE/TPS systems by extrusion, presenting different amounts of starch, from 10 to 40 wt %; the microstructure shows the presence of two polymeric phases and micro-voids.
